name: Delay Mage
description:
DELAY MAGE A game where spells have random directions, effects, and cast times Made in about 24 hours for the GMTK2020 Game Jam (theme was "Out of Control") Controls:
  • Arrow keys/WASD keys: Move
  • R: Retry
  • M: Mute sounds/music
Credits:
  • Coding, design, music, SFX, some sprites: Delta-key
  • Design, playtesting: Sucraiso
  • Tileset and most sprites: Canari Games
  • Text fonts: Daniel Linssen, BitPotion, and Nimble Beasts Collective
  • Base sounds:  Kenney Game Assets 1
Software credits:
  • Engine: Godot Engine v3.2.1 Stable
  • Sprites: Libresprite v1.0-dev, GIMP v2.10.18
  • Sounds: JXFR, Audacity v2.4.1
  • Music: Deflemask v0.12.1
Feedback is very welcome! Hope you enjoy playing!
